#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
#include<cstdio>
int main(){
	int test,i,n;
	scanf("%d",&test);
	printf("\n");
	while(test--){
		int sum,ans=0,y=0;
		scanf("%d",&n);
		for(i=10;i<n;i++){
			int x=i;
			sum=0;
			while(x>=1){
				sum+=x%10;
				x=x/10;
			}
		//	printf("%d\t",sum);
			ans=i+sum;
			if(ans==n){
   			y=ans;
			break;}
		}
		if(y>0)
		printf("%d\n",i);
		else
		printf("NONE\n");
	}
	return 0;
}
